title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Final approach Working Title CJ4
description:
In this how to we are going to look at how to fix the issue in which we experienced in last how to when using the Working Title CJ4 mod. The issue can happen if you configure the approach and you already bypassed the waypoint which is the starting point of the approach route. This will result in the aircraft to turn around and fly back to the previous waypoint, or in some cases the autopilot is completely lost and goes crazy.

We just got or instructions from ATC which runway and intersection we should use so enjoy this video.

Kudo's to Parry Lagler for providing the instructions on how to fix this issue. 

Working Title CJ4 can be downloaded from this site: https://github.com/Working-Title-MSFS-Mods/fspackages

The V abbreviations can be found on the site below:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/V_speeds
